com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.refl

Interface MethodQuery


  • public interface MethodQuery

    An interface that models a query to specify a method.

    • Method Summary

      • classMethod

        static MethodQuery classMethod(Class<?> targetClass,
                               String methodName,
                               Object... arguments)

        Create a MethodQuery object to search matching static methods.

        Parameters:
        targetClass - A class from which a method is searched.
        methodName - A name of a method to be searched.
        arguments - Argument values;
        Returns:
        A MethodQuery object.
